SUMMARY: As cruise companies head into their busiest season, they say they have ambitious plans to find cleaner sources of fuel. But critics say the progress is too slow.

SUMMARY: From an off-the-grid tropical hideaway to a reefside diving resort, these new hotels will take you far from anything that resembles snow and cold.

TITLE: Giant Wind Farms Arise Off Scotland, Easing the Pain of Oil’s Decline
SUMMARY: Oil and gas workers, losing their jobs as fossil fuel investment wanes, find work in the wind energy business.

TITLE: These Young Workers Are ‘Romanticizing’ the Return to Office
SUMMARY: As many others chafe against employer mandates, creators on TikTok —  some new to the work force — are trying to show that the office can be fun.

TITLE: Don’t Let a Co-Worker Turn Your Life Upside Down
SUMMARY: Or sing too loudly through the cubicle.

TITLE: Business Travel’s Rebound Is Being Hit by a Slowing Economy
SUMMARY: By the early fall, domestic business travel was back up to nearly two-thirds of its prepandemic level. But companies have now begun to cut back.
